_header: Lo in this song with harmony
_description: Verses on the philosopher’s stone, attributed to George Ripley — 38 non-rhyming quatrains

LincInnH90.First Lines:
Loe in this Song with HarmonyeThe Sages true It
                    testafie…
LincInnH90.Last Lines:
…To last after his birth againeHis ffurtile and sueete fruits
                    Amen
LincInnH90.Attributed Title:
Cantilena Georgii Riplei De Lapide Philosophorum seu De Phoenice (f.
                    46)
